https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k5m293hbXnwU1bJSH1VtMJC8qh3.jpg After a robbery gone wrong, three criminals turn against each other and embark on a blood-soaked bullet-riddled quest for cash and revenge. An unusual contemporary black-comedy western set in Australia, chock full of action and homage to the work of Sergio Leone. A Bullet in the Arse
